Title: Requires health insurance coverage of infertility to be provided to insureds with same sex partners on the same basis as that provided to insureds with a partner of the opposite sex
Summary: Requires health insurance coverage of infertility to be provided to insureds with same sex partners on the same basis as that provided to insureds with a partner of the opposite sex.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to coverage of the diagnosis and treatment of infertility
